data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 7,261 believers in the state of Graubünden to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Graubünden, Switzerland
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 181,100 people living in Graubünden, Switzerland. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 43,217, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Graubünden who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 7,261 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Graubünden, Switzerland.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Graubünden, Switzerland has a population of 181,100.

We estimate Graubünden has 7,261 people who might know Jesus, 130,622 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 43,217 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Graubünden do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: Graubünden
location.cities_list: Chur, Davos, Igis, Domat, St. Moritz
